author: djames
msg: Fix memory leak in Ruby bindings by not holding subpool.
Memory leak is a critical bug.

author: djames
msg: Merge r18924, r17931, r18928, r18951, and r18953 from trunk.
Support SWIG 1.3.28 in the Ruby bindings.
The latest stable SWIG version is 1.3.28. To be used extensively,
the Ruby bindings should support SWIG 1.3.28.

author: malcolm
msg: * STATUS: Upgrade my vote on r17280 et al from +0 to +1.

author: lgo
msg: Follow-up to r19700 with a test for issue #2552.
Verify that when passing --limit <= 0 to svn log, svn returns with an error.
(log_limit): add test cases for limit=0 and limit=-1.
